pr_title: Fix GRPC high CPU usage and long running queries

timeline.message:
Fix GRPC high CPU usage and long running queries

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText:
nit: Why not just do the max of (int) filter.getLimit() and grpcProperties.getMaxPageSize().
I think based on the logic, Integer.MAX_VALUE will never be the limit, and  grpcProperties.getMaxPageSize() will always have a value.
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Because if limit is 5 million we don't want to pick that as max. Unless you mean min, in which case limit can be zero for unlimited and don't want to choose that as min either
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Wish there was an easy way to utilize the onNext logic to test that x number of pages were traversed on a call to the db. Just logs for now is okay I guess
